downloadTitle: Update Federated Inbound Hybrid Search for M365
downloadDescription: This script is used to adjust an existing SharePoint Hybrid configuration to successfully work and authenticate using the new M365 Cloud Search engine.
detailsSection: To adopt this new back-end functionality offer, Tenant Admins will need to touch their SharePoint On-Prem configurations to allow the connection with the new back-end implementation from Microsoft. This configuration touch is provided as a PowerShell configuration script to apply all required configuration changes. The script is used to adjust an existing SharePoint Hybrid configuration to successfully work and authenticate using the new M365 Cloud Search engine.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a PowerShell script file. Users who do not have PowerShell installed can download latest version by following this link.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
